attributes.action: make changes to the dangerous dogs act .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
after a spate of dog attacks over the past few months.
i would like mr brown to make the following changes to the dangerous dogs act.
1.make owners take a course in dog handleing resulting in them been given a licence.
2.any person found to be not keeping a dog secure in there premises or who allows it loose on the roads or surrounding areas.to be instantly fined and the annimals removed from there owner ship.
3.review current banned dogs and see if rottwhilers,staffie cross breads ect should be added to this.
4.give more funding to councils for more dog wardens.
5.greater protection for people whose job involves entering premises when attacked by owners dogs i feel postman/women.paperboys/girls council or goverment workers should not be put at risk by owners who fail to secure control or have warning of annimal loose on there land.
5, give more power to police and council to act agenst dog owners who fail to control there annimals includeing jail sentences for repeat offenders.
